title: Need place to stay ? Ladies ONLY
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


Rent free accommodation for female only
Are you looking for somewhere to stay rent free ?

Do you need to move out of home or just want to start over somewhere new ?

This is ideal for student , single mum or someone who just wants to move to a new area for whatever reason.

You do not need to be working or have an income to live here as everything is provided for you ( Unless you want to work or you have job )
Immediate move in is Available !

This can be a short or long term arrangement ...days , weeks , months , even years if you want !

Ideally I'm looking for a girl ages 18-32

The house it is new and clean and has everything you need . high speed internet TV , Netflix , Gaming , Etc
Pub , Restaurant , Gym , Shopping mall, Bus station , Train station just 2 minutes walk .

About me ..in my 29 , 5'9" tall black short hair , black attractive eyes handsome athletic build , easy going , good conversationalist, laid back, enjoy going out and staying in and up for anything that's fun and mutually enjoyable .

Reply to this add and we can exchange phone number and have quick chat .... Please put GOOD FRIEND in subject line and add 2 picture in reply so I can understand you real, serious and read my add . Otherwise I delete it straight way ..
Thanks
